definition: Yellow Crane Tower in Wuhan City, built in 223, burnt down in 1884, rebuilt in 1985/favored place of poet sages, who in legend arrived riding golden cranes/Tang poem by Cui Hao 崔顥|崔颢[Cui1 Hao4], with theme 'the past will never return'/one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓|岳阳楼[Yue4 yang2 Lou2] in Yueyang, north Hunan, and Tengwang Tower 滕王閣|滕王阁[Teng2 wang2 Ge2] in Nanchang, Jiangxi
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: People in Wuhan are proud of the Yellow Crane Tower.
Do you want to visit Yellow Crane tower.
You want the Yellow Crane Tower in the picture?
sentences.chinese: 你想將黃鶴樓照進相片嗎？

sentences.english: I have to take the Yellow Crane to spare here, Yellow Crane Tower.
sentences.chinese: 昔人已乘黃鶴去，此地空餘黃鶴樓。

sentences.english: Xiren Crane has adopted various measures in this part of the Yellow Crane Tower.
sentences.chinese: 錫仁起重機已採取各項措施，在這部分的黃鶴樓。

sentences.english: The visiting guests were escorted to the Yellow Crane Tower last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上週日，來訪客和陪同人員一起參觀了黃鶴樓。

sentences.english: At age 12, he stood here in Zhaolin Park and marveled at an ice replica of the Yellow Crane Tower, an ancient pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 12歲時，他曾對兆麟公園的冰雕黃鶴樓嘖嘖稱奇。

sentences.english: " It is a real miracle that "Yellow Crane Tower" made the unparalleled poet Li Bai crown it as the best.
sentences.chinese: 一首《黃鶴樓》竟讓絕代詩仙稱首，實在是一個奇蹟。

sentences.english: Huanghe Lou or Yellow Crane Tower is in Wuhan by Yangtze ZRiver, Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 黃鶴樓故址在湖北省武漢市蛇山黃鶴灣，臨長江。

sentences.english: Saw a "Spring" word clock and the restoration of the Yellow Crane Tower.
sentences.chinese: 看到了一個“春”字的鐘和重修的黃鶴樓。

sentences.english: Wuhan is famous for the Yellow Crane Tower.
Do you know any most famous poem about yellow crane tower?
sentences.chinese: 你知道關於黃鶴樓的最著名的詩嗎？

sentences.english: "The old friend west dismisses Yellow Crane Tower , fireworks goes to Yangzhou in March". Come from that poem?
sentences.chinese: “故人西辭黃鶴樓，煙花三月下揚州。”出自那首詩？

sentences.english: Lily: Do you want to visit Yellow Crane tower.
Zhang said it was the timing that saw Yellow Crane Tower out of contention for the Final Draw this year.
sentences.chinese: 張說這也是時候說明黃鶴樓不在舉行盛典的討論中了。

sentences.english: Every year millions of tourists visit the tower coming from different parts of China.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有幾百萬來自於全國各地的遊客參觀黃鶴樓。

definition: to visit places famous for their scenery
Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
Linjiang county level city in Baishan 白山, Jilin
Yangguan or Southern Pass on the south Silk Road in Gansu, 70 km south of Dunhuang 敦煌
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Jiange county in Guangyuan 廣元|广元[Guang3 yuan2], Sichuan
to return home/fig. to retire from public life
Yandang mountains, famous scenic area in southeast Zhejiang
